definition: wholesale price/to settle an account/to pay a bill
to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)

sentences.english: Please go to the cashier to pay fees first.
sentences.chinese: 請您先到批價櫃檯繳費。

sentences.english: Don't I have to go to the billing office first?
sentences.chinese: 我沒必要先去批價處嗎？
